thread.title: Quennitta Pearson
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Quennitta Pearson

author: Quennitta Pearson
title: Quennitta Pearson
text: The customer service I received on Saturday was phenomenal she answered all my questions and everything was done in a timely manner. My delivery was just the same phenomena the delivery guys asked me if I had any questions or concerns and answered everything. I received excellent excellent customer service.
